text: Badin District () is a district in the Sindh province of Pakistan. == Administration == The district is administratively subdivided into the following talukas: * Badin Tehsil * Matli Tehsil * Shaheed Fazil Rahu Tehsil * Talhar Tehsil * Tando Bago Tehsil With the introduction of the devolution System the talukas have been sub-divided into the Union Councils numbering 49, Tapas 109 and Dehs 511. == References ==
title: Badin District
